comments.author: Werner
comments.body: Here's a link to a related story: [Cats control humans with high-pitched, urgent-sounding meows, study finds](https://www.nydailynews.com/2009/07/14/cats-control-humans-with-high-pitched-urgent-sounding-meows-study-finds/). When I click on the link on the main page, I just get re-routed to the main frenzy page. -- Mark.
